import React from 'react'; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; export class UserProfile extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ firstName:'', lastName:'', email:'', phone:0, interestRadio:1, additionalInfo: '' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(event, type){ console.log("type is "+ type); console.log("value is "+ event.target.value); this.setState({ [type]: event.target.value }) } onClick = (nr) => () => { this.setState({ interestRadio: nr }); } render(){ return(
this.handleChange(event, 'firstName')} label="First" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'lastName')} label="Last" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'additionalInfo')} label="Email *" group type="email" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'additionalInfo')} label="Phone *" group type="number" validate required />

hi

 this.handleChange(event, 'additionalInfo')} id="bookform-extrainfo" type="textarea" label="ex: I have a oddly shaped item..." rows="5" cols="100"/>
); } } export default UserProfile;
